Posts.Title: Lump on breast and swollen lymph nodes! Belle86 Belle86

Posts.Content: Belle86 wrote: Hi, Looking for some reassurance. Has anyone had swollen lymph nodes and a breast lump and it turned out to be something “ok”? I’m very worried and will be getting the mammogram, U/S in the next couple of weeks. I have two children 2 and 5 and I know I’m jumping the gun but I just can’t stop thinking that this just cannot happen to me! Can anyone offer any words of wisdom? Dx 12/22/2017, DCIS/IDC, Left, 6cm+, Stage IIIA, Grade 2, ER+/PR-, HER2- (FISH) Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lump on breast and swollen lymph nodes! Belle86 Belle86
